attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that revert on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, reverts on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers truncating the quotient, reverts on division by zero.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, reverts on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, reverts on overflow.
attributes.name: add

attributes.documentation:
@dev Divides two numbers and returns the remainder (unsigned integer modulo),
reverts when dividing by zero.
attributes.name: mod

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

@title MyToken
 * @dev Burnable Ownable ERC20 token
attributes.name: MyToken

attributes.documentation: Limit token transfer until the crowdsale is over.
attributes.name: canTransfer

attributes.documentation: The function can be called only before or after the tokens have been released
attributes.name: inReleaseState

attributes.documentation: The function can be called only by a whitelisted release agent.
attributes.name: onlyReleaseAgent

attributes.documentation: @dev Constructor that gives msg.sender all of existing tokens.

Set the contract that can call release and make the token transferable.
   * Design choice. Allow reset the release agent to fix fat finger mistakes.
attributes.name: setReleaseAgent

attributes.documentation: Owner can allow a particular address (a crowdsale contract) to transfer tokens despite the lock up period.
attributes.name: setTransferAgent
